long_description: The Patagonia Snowshot 3-in-1 insulated jacket delivers all-in-one versatility from the slopes to the village. Wear the waterproof shell or the insulated liner jacket on their own, or combine them.
short_description: The Patagonia Snowshot 3-in-1 insulated jacket delivers all-in-one versatility from the slopes to the village. Wear the waterproof shell or the insulated liner jacket on their own, or combine them.
